name: Frost (itch) (NotDawn)
description:
Frost is an awkward loner with no friends, who goes to the park alone.  For once she actually tries to find friends and ends up meeting Lilly. Will she finaly succeed and stop being such a loner.

There are 8 endings (Some are fairly minor.)

Entry for the Winter VN 2021 Jam.

This isn't actually done yet. Some of the expressions are missing. I will fix that maybe in a couple of days when I have more time.

Art, Coding, Writing: 

NotDawn

SFX:
